column1: Early Modern universities initially continued the curriculum and research of the Middle Ages: natural philosophy, logic, medicine, theology, mathematics, astronomy (and astrology), law, grammar and rhetoric. Aristotle was prevalent throughout the curriculum, while medicine also depended on Galen and Arabic scholarship. The importance of humanism for changing this state-of-affairs cannot be underestimated. Once humanist professors joined the university faculty, they began to transform the study of grammar and rhetoric through the studia humanitatis. Humanist professors focused on the ability of students to write and speak with distinction, to translate and interpret classical texts, and to live honorable lives. Other scholars within the university were affected by the humanist approaches to learning and their linguistic expertise in relation to ancient texts, as well as the ideology that advocated the ultimate importance of those texts. Professors of medicine such as Niccolò Leoniceno, Thomas Linacre and William Cop were often trained in and taught from a humanist perspective as well as translated important ancient medical texts. The critical mindset imparted by humanism was imperative for changes in universities and scholarship. For instance, Andreas Vesalius was educated in a humanist fashion before producing a translation of Galen, whose ideas he verified through his own dissections. In law, Andreas Alciatus infused the Corpus Juris with a humanist perspective, while Jacques Cujas humanist writings were paramount to his reputation as a jurist. Philipp Melanchthon cited the works of Erasmus as a highly influential guide for connecting theology back to original texts, which was important for the reform at Protestant universities. Galileo Galilei, who taught at the Universities of Pisa and Padua, and Martin Luther, who taught at the University of Wittenberg (as did Melanchthon), also had humanist training. The task of the humanists was to slowly permeate the university; to increase the humanist presence in professorships and chairs, syllabi and textbooks so that published works would demonstrate the humanistic ideal of science and scholarship.
column2: "Zgodnje moderne univerze so sprva ohranjale učni načrt in raziskave iz srednjega veka na naslednjih področjih: naravna filozofija, logika, medicina, teologija, matematika, astronomija (in astrologija), pravo, slovnica in retorika. Aristotel je prevladoval v celotnem učnem načrtu, medtem ko je medicina temeljila tudi na galenskih in arabskih šolah. Pomena humanizma za spreminjanje teh razmer ni mogoče podcenjevati. Ko so se humanistični profesorji pridružili univerzitetni fakulteti, so začeli spreminjati študij slovnice in retorike skozi načrt šolanja, ki se je imenoval studia humanitatis. Humanistični profesorji so se osredotočali na sposobnost študentov, da pišejo in govorijo z odliko, prevajajo in interpretirajo klasična besedila ter živijo častna življenja. Humanistični pristopi k učenju in njihovo jezikovno znanje v zvezi s starodavnimi besedili, kot tudi ideologija, ki zagovarja končni pomen teh besedil, so vplivali na druge učenjake na univerzi. Profesorji medicine, kot so Niccolò Leoniceno, Thomas Linacre in William Cop, so se pogosto usposabljali in učili s humanistične perspektive ter prevajali pomembna starodavna medicinska besedila. Kritična miselnost, ki jo je vpeljal humanizem, je bila nujna za spremembe na univerzah in pri šolanju. Andreas Vesalius je bil na primer izobražen na humanistični način, preden je prevedel Galena, katerega ideje je potrdil s svojimi analizami. V pravu je Andreas Alciatus odločno zapovedoval Corpus Juris s humanistične perspektive, medtem ko so bili humanistični zapisi Jacquesa Cujasa bistvenega pomena za njegov pravniški ugled. Philipp Melanchthon je navajal dela Erasmusa kot zelo vpliven vodnik za povezovanje teologije z izvirnimi besedili, kar je bilo pomembno za reformo na protestantskih univerzah. Galileo Galilei, ki je poučeval na univerzah v Pisi in Padovi, in Martin Luter, ki je poučeval na Univerzi v Wittenbergu (tako kot Melanchthon), sta tudi imela humanistično usposabljanje. Naloga humanistov je bila, da se počasi uveljavijo na univerzi; da povečajo humanistično prisotnost med profesorjih in na položajih, v učnih načrtih in učbenikih, da bi objavljena dela prikazovala humanistični ideal znanosti in šolanja."

column1: On 22 July 2010, the British government agreed to help pay for the new airport using taxpayer money. In November 2011 a new deal between the British government and South African civil engineering company Basil Read was signed and the airport was scheduled to open in February 2016, with flights to and from South Africa and the UK. In March 2015 South African airline Comair became the preferred bidder to provide weekly air service between the island and Johannesburg, starting from 2016.
column2: Britanska vlada se je 22. julija 2010 odločila, da bo pomagala plačati za novo letališče z davkoplačevalskim denarjem. Novembra 2011 je bil podpisan nov dogovor med britansko vlado in južnoafriškim gradbenim podjetjem Basil Read, letališče pa naj bi se odprlo februarja 2016, z leti v in iz Južne Afrike in Združenega kraljestva. Marca 2015 je južnoafriška letalska družba Comair postala prednostni ponudnik za zagotavljanje tedenskega zračnega prevoza med otokom in Johannesburgom, z začetkom leta 2016.

column2: 22. julija 2010

column1: Problems with the 10NES lockout chip frequently resulted in the console's most infamous problem: the blinking red power light, in which the system appears to turn itself on and off repeatedly because the 10NES would reset the console once per second. The lockout chip required constant communication with the chip in the game to work. Dirty, aging and bent connectors would often disrupt the communication, resulting in the blink effect. Alternatively, the console would turn on but only show a solid white, gray, or green screen. Users attempted to solve this problem by blowing air onto the cartridge connectors, inserting the cartridge just far enough to get the ZIF to lower, licking the edge connector, slapping the side of the system after inserting a cartridge, shifting the cartridge from side to side after insertion, pushing the ZIF up and down repeatedly, holding the ZIF down lower than it should have been, and cleaning the connectors with alcohol. These attempted solutions often became notable in their own right and are often remembered alongside the NES. Many of the most frequent attempts to fix this problem instead ran the risk of damaging the cartridge and/or system.[citation needed] In 1989, Nintendo released an official NES Cleaning Kit to help users clean malfunctioning cartridges and consoles.
column2: Težave s čipom za zaklepanje 10NES so pogosto povzročile najbolj zloglasen problem konzole: utripajoča rdeča lučka za zagon, ki jo je povzročalo večkratno samodejno vklapljanje in izklapljanje sistema, saj je 10NES ponastavil konzolo enkrat na sekundo. Za delovanje je čip za zaklepanje zahteval stalno komunikacijo s čipom v igri. Umazani, starajoči se in upognjeni konektorji so pogosto motili komunikacijo in povzročili utripanje. Lahko se je dogajalo tudi, da se je konzola vklopila, vendar prikazovala le enobarven bel, siv ali zeleni zaslon. Uporabniki so poskušali rešiti to težavo s pihanjem zraka na konektorje kasete, vstavitvijo kasete ravno dovolj daleč, da se je ZIF spustil, lizanjem konektorja na robu, udarjanjem strani sistema po vstavitvi kasete, premikanjem kasete z ene strani na drugo po vstavitvi, večkratnim potiskanjem ZIF-a navzgor in navzdol, držanjem ZIF-a nižje, kot bi moral biti, in čiščenjem konektorjev z alkoholom. Ti poskusi rešitev so pogosto postali znani sami po sebi in se jih uporabniki pogosto spominjajo poleg NES-a. Pri veliko najbolj pogostih poskusov reševanja težave je obstajalo tveganje, da se poškodujeta kaseta in/ali sistem. Leta 1989 je Nintendo izdal uradni komplet za čiščenje NES, ki je uporabnikom pomagal pri čiščenju okvarjenih kaset in konzol.

column1: Critics noted in 2013 that Tom Wheeler, the head of the FCC, which has to approve the deal, is the former head of both the largest cable lobbying organization, the National Cable & Telecommunications Association, and as largest wireless lobby, CTIA – The Wireless Association. According to Politico, Comcast "donated to almost every member of Congress who has a hand in regulating it." The US Senate Judiciary Committee held a hearing on the deal on April 9, 2014. The House Judiciary Committee planned its own hearing. On March 6, 2014 the United States Department of Justice Antitrust Division confirmed it was investigating the deal. In March 2014, the division's chairman, William Baer, recused himself because he was involved in a prior Comcast NBCUniversal acquisition. Several states' attorneys general have announced support for the federal investigation. On April 24, 2015, Jonathan Sallet, general counsel of the F.C.C., said that he was going to recommend a hearing before an administrative law judge, equivalent to a collapse of the deal.
column2: "Kritiki so leta 2013 ugotovili, da je Tom Wheeler, vodja FCC, ki mora odobriti dogovor, nekdanji vodja tako največje kabelske lobistične organizacije National Cable & Telecommunications Association, kot tudi največjega brezžičnega lobija CTIA – The Wireless Association. Po mnenju Politica je Comcast »plačal donacije skoraj vsakemu članu ameriškega kongresa, ki je sodeloval pri njegovi regulaciji.« Sodni svet ameriškega senata je 9. aprila 2014 obravnaval dogovor. Sodni svet ameriškega spodnjega doma je načrtoval lastno obravnavo. 6. marca 2014 je protimonopolni oddelek ameriškega ministrstva za pravosodje potrdil, da preiskuje dogovor. Marca 2014 je predsednik oddelka William Baer odstopil, ker je bil vpleten v predhodni prevzem podjetja Comcast NBCUniversal. Več državnih tožilcev je napovedalo podporo zvezni preiskavi. 24. aprila 2015 je Jonathan Sallet, generalni svetovalec pri F.C.C., dejal, da bo priporočil zaslišanje pred sodnikom upravnega prava, kar bi pomenilo propad dogovora."

column1: Who was the head of the FCC at the time of Comcast's proposed purchase of Time Warner Cable?
column2: Kdo je bil vodja FCC, ko je Comcast predlagal nakup podjetja Time Warner Cable?

column1: Tom Wheeler
column2: Tom Wheeler

column1: Chengdu Hi-tech Development Zone covers an area of 82.5 km2 (31.9 sq mi), consisting of the South Park and the West Park. By relying on the city sub-center, which is under construction, the South Park is focusing on creating a modernized industrial park of science and technology with scientific and technological innovation, incubation R&D, modern service industry and Headquarters economy playing leading roles. Priority has been given to the development of software industry. Located on both sides of the "Chengdu-Dujiangyan-Jiuzhaigou" golden tourism channel, the West Park aims at building a comprehensive industrial park targeting at industrial clustering with complete supportive functions. The West Park gives priority to three major industries i.e. electronic information, biomedicine and precision machinery.
column2: "Razvojno območje Chengdu Hi-tech je veliko 82,5 km² (31,9 kvadratnih milj), sestavljata pa ga Južni park in Zahodni park. Z opiranjem na mestno podsredišče, ki je v gradnji, se Južni park osredotoča na ustvarjanje moderniziranega industrijskega parka znanosti in tehnologije z znanstvenimi in tehnološkimi inovacijami, inkubacijo RTD, sodobno storitveno industrijo in centralnim gospodarstvom, ki igrajo vodilno vlogo. Prednost ima razvoj programske industrije. Zahodni park, ki se nahaja na obeh straneh zlatega turističnega kanala »Chengdu-Dujiangyan-Jiuzhaigou«, načrtuje gradnjo celostnega industrijskega parka, usmerjenega v industrijsko povezovanje z izpolnjenimi podpornimi funkcijami. Zahodni park daje prednost trem glavnim industrijam, to so: elektronske informacije, biomedicina in precizna mehanizacija."

column1: Which Parks make up the Chengdu Hi-tech Development Zone?
column2: Kateri parki sestavljajo Razvojno območje Chengdu Hi-tech?

column1: South Park and the West Park
column2: Južni park in Zahodni park
